Dog-powered air travel: Dogs could be trained to fly small planes, providing a unique and eco-friendly mode of transportation.
Dog-assisted search and rescue: Dogs with specialized training could be used to locate missing persons or objects from the sky.
Dog-themed airline: A new airline could be created specifically for dogs and their owners, offering customized in-flight experiences and pet-friendly amenities.
Dog-powered drone delivery: Dogs could be trained to deliver packages using drones, revolutionizing the delivery industry.
Dog-themed hotels: Hotels could be designed with dog-friendly amenities, such as dog-friendly rooms, dog parks, and even dog-themed suites.
